attributes.action: Put the UK back into a full lockdown
attributes.additional_details: The UK was in a national lockdown when cases were at 20,000, now we are at nearly 60,000 daily cases per day and the government puts Britain’s inhabitants at risk.
attributes.background: To be put into a national lockdown for two months, the sooner it happens the less damage can be caused be the virus. Many students are stressed with exams being on, the added stress that they could potentially be infecting family members whilst mixing at school only makes matters worse.
